name: Strawberry Blintzes
author: Morgan
summary: My mom makes these every year. They are my favorite breakfast by far! I usually double the filling.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen sweetened strawberries, thawed, or to taste
directions: Beat eggs, flour, and salt together in a large bowl until smooth
Mix in milk and 1 1/2 tablespoon butter gradually
Cover with plastic wrap and let batter rest in the refrigerator, at least 2 hours
Combine cottage cheese, cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend until filling is smooth
Melt a bit of butter in a large skillet or crepe pan over medium heat
Ladle in a small amount of batter and swirl skillet to spread batter in a thin layer
Flip and continue cooking until second side is cooked, about 10 seconds
Transfer to a plate to cool
Repeat with remaining butter and batter
Spoon filling onto blintzes and fold
